model_performance.assessment: Ready for clinical deployment with threshold monitoring

clinical_impact.recommendation: Deploy with comprehensive patient counseling protocol

consistency_check.explanation: Small difference due to discrete threshold grid and sample size

interpretability_report.clinical_trust: High - clear feature importance and decision explanations available

preprocessing_order: 6. No feature scaling/transformation (preserved for model-specific handling)

leakage_prevention.group_isolation: No patient appears in multiple splits
leakage_prevention.scaling: Applied only on training data, then to calib/test

ethical_considerations.invasive_testing_risk: 20 women will undergo invasive confirmatory testing with ~0.1-0.3% miscarriage risk
ethical_considerations.false_positive_impact: 10 women will experience unnecessary anxiety and invasive testing
ethical_considerations.missed_cases_impact: 110 cases will be missed, potentially leading to unprepared families
ethical_considerations.informed_consent: Clear communication of test limitations and follow-up requirements essential
ethical_considerations.equity_considerations: Ensure equal access across socioeconomic groups

deployment_recommendations: Establish clear protocols for positive result communication
Develop patient education materials about test limitations
Plan for data collection on real-world performance

operational_readiness.pilot_recommendation: Start with 3-month pilot study monitoring real-world performance
